content.html:
I just had a realisation about #Autism diagnostic criteria. I suspect this applies to other #disabilities too.

It's largely a collection of the reasons others don't like us.

That's why in many cases if a medical practitioner sees things about you they do like, they withhold diagnosis. For example, if they perceive you as attractive, intelligent, funny, approachable, i.e. to them, likeable.

It's straight #ableism : "You can't be disabled, because I like you, and I don't like disabled people."
content.value: I just had a realisation about #Autism diagnostic criteria. I suspect this applies to other #disabilities too.It's largely a collection of the reasons others don't like us.That's why in many cases if a medical practitioner sees things about you they do like, they withhold diagnosis. content.html: What I'm saying is that there's only one creative team that has repeatedly demonstrated the ability to produce adaptations of literary classics. And that's why The Muppets should have been allowed to make the Dune movie.

Today as you injest your stimulant to recover from last night's run on the megacorp, jacking in to the warm glow of pixels being flung at your mirror-shade covered eyes,

Try to remember the true meaning of Cyber Monday.

content.html: the spiral labyrinth seems to be working! i was a little worried, the tuning of this one is /extremely/ delicate and last time i tried to refactor one of these it didn't feel the same afterward. left is original, right is refactored.
